name: Global Defense Corps
description:
The planet is under attack by an unknown alien threat. It is up to you, commander of the Global Defense Corps to save humanity.

  • Kill aliens
  • Protect civilians
  • Survive

Global Defense Corps was built as a part of the 5th #GBJAM in less than a week by a team operating across the United Kingdom.

Features
  • Bite size action
  • Retro 8-bit / Game Boy visuals
  • Awesome chip tune soundtrack by Barry "Epoch" Topping
  • Explosions
Team

Code and Design by Pete Smith
@pjs_dev | Web

Design, Art and Audio by Sean Noonan
@SeanNoonan | Web

Music by Barry Topping
@nostoppingepoch | Web
